column2: Crime (recorded by Police) by selected offence groups
A yearly snapshot depicting the crime rate in bristol per 1000 persons.
Burglary and violent & sexual offence incidents against the total number of crimes reported to the police. Provided at ward level and expressed as a rate per 1,000 of the ward population.
No additiona calculations have been performed on the data and it is presented as found
